| Overview                = The '''Angels''' are (in [[Christianity]]'s hierarchy of [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]), a choir of the [[Third Sphere]], along with the [[Archai]] ([[Principalities]]) and the [[Archangels (Earth-616)|Archangels]]. Their name has become the common term for the entire kind.{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}}
